translation: Kya aashi kor na tuhndi khạṭr tuhund synh (ʿlm v ḥkmt th mʿrft kh nvurkhạṭr) kushadh.
Th aashi loczrvv tuhund (aumt kh ghmuk suh) bar tohyhi nishhi.
Yus tuhndis (mbark) pshts pytth gob avs gczhan.
Th aashi kr tuhndi khạṭri tuhnz dhkr (pnnhi dhkri sintụ̄ rlạvith dnyahs th ạkhrts mnz pth jayhi) blnd.
Lhādha chhe be shk pth dshvạry sintụ̄ āsạny (yivan).
Pth yylhi tohụ̄ (aumt chh tʿlymhi,tblygh th jhad byyhi frẓ ada krnh nishhi) fargh spdiv tylhi ạsiv (dhkri th ʿbadts mnz) mḥnt kran.
Byyhi ạsiv pnnis rbs kun rạghb spdan.
